    • Constructor Detail

      • Window

        public Window(java.lang.String title,
              int width,
              int height,
              boolean vSync)
        Construct a window
        This method constructs a window with the given parameters. Note that this does not initialize the window, it just sets up instance variables.
        Parameters:
        title - the title
        width - the width
        height - the height
        vSync - the vsync deprecated

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialize the window
        This method initializes the window using GLFW.

      • setClearColor

        public void setClearColor(float r,
                          float g,
                          float b,
                          float alpha)
        Set the clear color
        This method sets the clear color of the window, which is basically the background color.
        Parameters:
        r - red amount
        g - green amount
        b - blue amount
        alpha - transparency
